author: Karl Guttag
description: Introduction Just a short note today. I’m in the middle of my trip, which will end in Eindhoven next week (see notice at the end of this article), when I heard that Meta had leaked a video on YouTube of its Monocular AR glasses, which are expected to be disclosed at Meta Connect tomorrow, September […]
title: Meta RayBan AR Glasses Shows Lumus Waveguide Structures in Leaked Video
